Method Detail

addCacheEventListeners

public void addCacheEventListeners(java.lang.Class<? extends PersistentDTO> observe,
                                   ChangeEvent.ChangeType type,
                                   ChangeListener... listeners)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Description copied from interface: CacheEventRegistrar
Register event listeners for certain class and change type. If type is not mentioned it will mean for all.

Specified by:
addCacheEventListeners in interface CacheEventRegistrar
Parameters:
observe - The class type to observe. It can not be NULL.
type - The change type to observe.
listeners - Listeners to register, can not be NULL or empty
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If observe is NULL and/or listeners is NULL or EMPTY

removeListeners

public void removeListeners(ChangeListener... listeners)
Description copied from interface: CacheEventRegistrar
Remove the listeners from all registers.

Specified by:
removeListeners in interface CacheEventRegistrar
Parameters:
listeners - Listeners to be removed from observation

fireEvent

public void fireEvent(ChangeEvent event)
Description copied from interface: CacheEventRegistrar
Fire the event to appropriate observers.

Specified by:
fireEvent in interface CacheEventRegistrar
Parameters:
event - Event to trigger
